heading: Top of the mourning to ya
text: Early favourites Ireland finally arrive home in disgrace having been hiding in Copenhagen following tournament disaster.

heading: It's a stitch up!
text: Explosive allegations against tournament organisers from Färm as Denmark misses out while Portugal and South Africa advance.

heading: 'Fisching' for any kind of advantage
text: Moberg hopes his name change to Fischerström will give South Korea the edge.

heading: Berger hits the books in Bologna
text: Pasta and gegenpressing were on the menu as Fred returns with fresh defensive tactical plans.

heading: Full (Den)marks in early test
text: Denmark make a big statement of intent by beating tournament favourites Germany.

heading: South Korea under pressure
text: Absences throw dark horses' tournament into doubt.

heading: Wickström in race against time to be fit
text: It seems Sport Löv doesn't löve back as Björn battles skiing related calf injury.

heading: Can reigning champ Hwa Rang prove he's still the dominant foos-force?
text: Heading into his title defence has Hwa Rang still got what it takes.

heading: Emelie's sunshine escape all about less tanning more planning
text: The young rookie is taking her first tournament seriously with a Costa Rican training camp.
